articles.description: The Southern African Development Community's Standby Force was supposed to be deployed to Mozambique on Thursday, but unrest in South Africa may have prevented this.
articles.content:
• The SADC Standby Force was supposed to deploy to Mozambique on Thursday.
  • The internal deployment will leave very few forces for the regional mission to Mozambique, say experts.
